trans-unit.source: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMap" /> objects.
The <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> and <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> classes represent the default implementations of the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider>和<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类表示的抽象的默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>使用一个名为 Web.sitemap 的 XML 文件来存储站点地图数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web.sitemap 文件上的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 站点地图](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ParentProvider%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类通过声明支持的站点映射提供程序层次结构，概念<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ParentProvider%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> can be a child or parent of another provider.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>可以是子任务或其他提供程序的父级。

trans-unit.source: This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以拥有或维护其自己站点图和站点地图提供程序的不同的开发组由实现不同的站点的内容区域的位置。

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> objects are configured in the Web.config files.
trans-unit.target: 所有<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>在 Web.config 文件中配置对象。

trans-unit.source: Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data.
trans-unit.target: 在这些配置文件中声明任何站点映射提供程序已在运行时加载，并且用于加载和处理站点导航数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMap> object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its <xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A> property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMap>对象，用于跟踪的所有提供程序可供通过其<xref:System.Web.SiteMap.Providers%2A>属性集合，提供以编程方式访问管理的提供程序的导航数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示用于声明站点地图提供商提供的 Web.config 文件中的格式。

trans-unit.source: The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> controls, to display site map information for users.
trans-unit.target: 通过这些提供程序加载的站点导航数据是其他组件使用的站点映射基础结构，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，以显示站点的用户的映射信息。

trans-unit.source: If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你实现自己站点映射的提供程序，你可以在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 App_Code 目录中放置的源文件，然后将自动编译的程序集。

trans-unit.source: You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以将自己站点映射提供程序放在全局程序集缓存 (GAC)，并提供对它的 Web.config 文件中的完全限定引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md).
trans-unit.target: 编译器服务的详细信息，请参阅[使用程序集和全局程序集缓存](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何编写一个实现抽象类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: This example includes only a sample <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> and a sample text file that works with it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例包括一个示例，仅<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>和示例文本文件，使用它。

trans-unit.source: To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例还需要在 Web.config 文件和.aspx 页面中的条目。

trans-unit.source: You can find these in the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以找到这些文档中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource.SiteMapProvider%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用遵循预期的结构来加载站点地图信息的逗号分隔的文件。

trans-unit.source: The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes.
trans-unit.target: 该文件的第一行表示站点地图的根节点和后续行是子节点。

trans-unit.source: Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL.
trans-unit.target: 每个子节点标识其父节点的 URL。

trans-unit.source: An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 满足这些条件的文件的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`中提供的所有示例实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> class, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode(System.String)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNode(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />.
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />类，你必须重写以下成员： <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore" />， <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode(System.String)" />， <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />，和<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNode(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> class.
The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class is not instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>直接未实例化类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor is called from the constructor of classes that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数从派生自的类的构造函数中调用<xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> to add to the node collection maintained by the provider.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.

Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A> method and provide logic for adding a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A>方法，并提供用于添加逻辑<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>到站点地图提供程序由维护的节点集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A> method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.NotImplementedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> to add to the node collection maintained by the provider.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that is the parent of <c>node</c>.
Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider and specifies the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object.

Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A> method and provide logic for adding a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object with a specified parent to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A>方法，并提供用于添加逻辑<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>具有到站点地图提供商提供由维护的节点集合指定的父对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method adds the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is specified by `node` to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection that is maintained by the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object and creates a parent/child relationship between the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is specified by `node` and `parentNode`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将添加<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>由指定的对象`node`到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>集合由维护<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>对象，并创建之间的父/子关系<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>指定的对象`node`和`parentNode`。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A> method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.AddNode%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.NotImplementedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that represents the currently requested page.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> ，表示当前请求的页; 否则为<see langword="null" />，如果<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />找不到或无法返回当前用户。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event is raised before attempting to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object, to enable event subscribers to return an instance of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>然后再尝试检索引发事件<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，启用事件订阅服务器，以返回的实例<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>类。

trans-unit.source: If there are no event subscribers, the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class calls the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method using the current HTTP context to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that represents the currently requested page.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有事件订阅服务器，<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类调用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法使用当前 HTTP 上下文检索<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，表示当前请求的页。

trans-unit.source: If the currently requested page does not correspond with a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用不符合当前请求的页<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: If security trimming is enabled and the user is not permitted to access the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了安全修整且不允许用户访问<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A> property in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A>实现抽象类中的属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether localized values of <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> attributes are returned.
<see langword="true" /> if a localized value of the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> attributes are returned; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果本地化值的<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />属性是返回; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.EnableLocalization%2A> property is used for the get accessor of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Description%2A> properties, as well as additional <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Attributes%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.EnableLocalization%2A>属性用于的 get 访问器<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Description%2A>属性，以及为其他<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Attributes%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that represents a page.
A URL that identifies the page for which to retrieve a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that represents the page at the specified URL.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the page identified by <paramref name="rawURL" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if no corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is found or if security trimming is enabled and the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> cannot be returned for the current user.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class must implement the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类必须实现抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 URL 可以是虚方法或绝对 URL。

trans-unit.source: It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`.
trans-unit.target: 它也可能是使用应用程序相关的语法，如 URL `~/apprelativedirectory`。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that any implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly.
trans-unit.target: 确保的任何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法分析和正确处理应用程序相关的语法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，使用的 URL<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>作为类所维护的各种集合中的键的对象。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>提供了一个 URL，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供作用域内。

trans-unit.source: If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何 URL，生成的唯一标识符来标识<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>类中实现抽象方法<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用一个名为的帮助器方法`FindUrl`，若要获取当前显示页面的 URL<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode(System.String)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to extend the search to any child providers, if a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that matches the URL is not found by the provider in the current site map and the provider supports child providers.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode(System.String)" />方法在派生类中，请务必将搜索扩展到任何子提供程序中，如果<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />提供程序不会将与 URL 匹配的对象位于当前站点图，以及提供程序支持子提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> used to match node information with the URL of the requested page.
Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object that represents the currently requested page using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if no corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> can be found in the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> or if the page context is <see langword="null" />.

The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method calls the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object for the currently requested page based on the raw URL or the virtual path of the request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法调用抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象当前请求的页基于的原始 URL 或请求的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: If no corresponding <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> is found in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMap>, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有对应<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>中找到<xref:System.Web.SiteMap>，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method does not check whether a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> is accessible to a user, by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法不会检查是否<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>可供用户，默认情况下访问。

trans-unit.source: A lookup key with which a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is created.
Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object based on a specified key.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the page identified by <paramref name="key" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if no corresponding <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is found or if security trimming is enabled and the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> cannot be returned for the current user.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> implementation returns `null` in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>实现返回`null`在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> method to provide lookup functionality based on a unique key (instead of a URL, which is used by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A> method).
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A>方法以提供查找功能基于唯一键 (而不是一个 URL，用于通过<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNode%2A>方法)。

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A> method if your site map provider implementation uses the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object as a primary identifier in a site map structure.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.FindSiteMapNodeFromKey%2A>方法如果你站点地图提供程序实现使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Key%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象作为站点地图结构中的主要标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider> class provides an implementation that handles searching for site map nodes that do not define a URL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.StaticSiteMapProvider>类提供处理搜索站点地图节点的未定义 URL 的实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，使用的 URL<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>作为类所维护的各种集合中的键。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if a node provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果一个节点提供了一个 URL，它必须是唯一的站点地图提供商提供的作用域内。

trans-unit.source: If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不提供任何 URL，生成的唯一标识符来标识<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> for which to retrieve all child nodes.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the child nodes of a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />.

A read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> that contains the immediate child nodes of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> or an empty collection, if no child nodes exist.
Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class must implement the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类必须实现抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A> method in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A>类中实现抽象方法<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` stores the hierarchical parent/child relationships in one <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object and all <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects in another.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`将层次结构的父/子关系存储在一个<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>对象及其所有<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>中另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A> method performs a reverse-lookup using both <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes%2A>方法执行反向查找同时使用<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to perform security trimming on the child nodes and ensure that the returned collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetChildNodes(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />方法在派生类中，请务必执行安全修整的子节点上并确保返回的集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The collection contains only the immediate children of the specified <paramref name="node" />.
trans-unit.target: 该集合包含仅指定的直属子级<paramref name="node" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of ancestor site map node generations to get.
A value of -1 indicates that all ancestors might be retrieved and cached by the provider.
Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving the node for the currently requested page and fetching the parent and ancestor site map nodes for the current page.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A> property; however, site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A> method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>, as well as the parent and ancestor nodes of the parent.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A>属性; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A>方法并提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回当前优化的实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>，以及父节点和上级节点的父级。

trans-unit.source: The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: `upLevel`参数用于指定的父节点和上级节点检索多少个级别。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the parent and ancestor nodes can be linked to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A> method, using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，父节点和上级节点可以链接到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A>方法，使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> for specific <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，缓存在内存中，这会导致很少或没有开销，查询时的整个站点映射<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>特定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upLevel" /> is less than -1.
The number of ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> generations to fetch.
0 indicates no ancestor nodes are retrieved and -1 indicates that all ancestors might be retrieved and cached by the provider.
The number of child <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> generations to fetch.
0 indicates no descendant nodes are retrieved and a -1 indicates that all descendant nodes might be retrieved and cached by the provider.
Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving the node for the currently requested page and fetching the site map nodes in the proximity of the current node.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the currently requested page; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method returns the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A> property; however, site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object, as well as <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects that are in the proximity of the current <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A>属性; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法并提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回当前优化的实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，以及<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象内的当前相近<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve and cache, along with their immediate children.
trans-unit.target: `upLevel`参数用于指定多少个级别的父节点和上级节点来检索并缓存，以及其直接子项。

trans-unit.source: The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of descendant nodes from the current <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: `downLevel`参数用于指定从当前的子代节点的多少个级别<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>来检索。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that is returned by the
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，祖先和后代节点可以链接到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>返回

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method, using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> 方法，使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer ancestor or child node levels than are specified by `upLevel` or `downLevel`, only those that are available are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 如果有较少祖先或子节点级别不是由指定`upLevel`或`downLevel`，仅显示那些可检索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> for specific <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类，它是 ASP.NET 的默认 site 映射提供程序，缓存在内存中，这会导致很少或没有开销，查询时的整个站点映射<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>特定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upLevel" /> or <paramref name="downLevel" /> is less than -1.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> for which to retrieve the parent node.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the parent node of a specific <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the parent of <paramref name="node" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> has no parent or security trimming is enabled and the parent node is not accessible to the current user.

<block subset="none" type="note"><para><see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNode(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" /> might also return <see langword="null" /> if the parent node belongs to a different provider.
In this case, use the <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode" /> property of <paramref name="node" /> instead.
The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNode%2A> method in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNode%2A>类中实现抽象方法<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` stores the hierarchical parent/child relationship between <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects in an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface, such as an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`存储之间的层次结构的父/子关系<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>中的对象<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口，如<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The number of ancestor node levels to traverse when retrieving the requested ancestor node.
The number of descendant node levels to retrieve from the target ancestor node.
Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving an ancestor node for the currently requested page and fetching the descendant nodes for the ancestor.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents an ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> of the currently requested page; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the current or ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class provides a non-optimized implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method, calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> methods; however, site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the ancestor node and perform an optimized lookup of the other <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类提供的非优化实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法，调用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetCurrentNodeAndHintAncestorNodes%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法和提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回祖先节点，并执行其他优化的查找一个优化的实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `walkupLevels` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to traverse when retrieving the target node.
trans-unit.target: `walkupLevels`参数用于指定多少个级别的父节点和上级节点遍历时检索目标节点。

trans-unit.source: If fewer levels exist than are requested, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的层次少于请求`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of descendant nodes from the target ancestor node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: `downLevel`参数用于指定从要检索的目标祖先节点的子代节点的多少个级别。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method, using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，祖先和后代节点可以链接到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法，使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="walkupLevels" /> or <paramref name="relativeDepthFromWalkup" /> is less than 0.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that acts as a reference point for <c>walkupLevels</c> and <c>relativeDepthFromWalkup</c>.
The number of ancestor node levels to traverse when retrieving the requested ancestor node.
The number of descendant node levels to retrieve from the target ancestor node.
Provides an optimized lookup method for site map providers when retrieving an ancestor node for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object and fetching its child nodes.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents an ancestor of <paramref name="node" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />, if the current or ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> is not found or cannot be returned for the current user.

The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class provides a non-optimized implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method, calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> methods; however, site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the ancestor node and perform an optimized lookup of the other <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类提供的非优化实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法，调用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法; 但是，在站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法和提供使用自定义缓存机制来返回祖先节点，并执行其他优化的查找一个优化的实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method is very similar to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法是非常类似于<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToCurrentNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `walkupLevels` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to traverse when retrieving the target node.
trans-unit.target: `walkupLevels`参数用于指定多少个级别的父节点和上级节点遍历时检索目标节点。

trans-unit.source: If fewer levels exist than are requested, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的层次少于请求`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of descendant nodes from the target ancestor node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: `downLevel`参数用于指定从要检索的目标祖先节点的子代节点的多少个级别。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A> method, using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，祖先和后代节点可以链接到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetParentNodeRelativeToNodeAndHintDownFromParent%2A>方法，使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If there are fewer ancestor node levels than specified by the `upLevel` parameter, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有较少的祖先节点级别与所指定的`upLevel`参数，`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: It is up to the provider implementer to decide how to handle the situation where the number of available descendant node levels is less than the value that is specified by the `downLevel` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它取决于提供程序实施者决定如何处理这种情况，可用子代节点级别数小于指定的值是`downLevel`参数。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for <paramref name="walkupLevels" /> or <paramref name="relativeDepthFromWalkup" /> is less than 0.
<paramref name="node" /> is <see langword="null" />.
When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the root node of all the nodes that are currently managed by the current provider.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the root node of the set of nodes that the current provider manages.

The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A> method enables a parent provider in a provider hierarchy to obtain a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that acts as a frame of reference for building the provider hierarchy and the larger site map node hierarchy that is the sum of the site map data that each provider manages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A>方法实现中提供程序层次结构中，若要获取的父提供程序<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>充当参考框架，为生成提供程序层次结构和更大的站点映射节点层次结构，该站点地图数据之和的对象，每个都提供程序管理。

trans-unit.source: The provider that calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore" />.
Retrieves the root node of all the nodes that are currently managed by the specified site map provider.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that represents the root node of the set of nodes that is managed by <paramref name="provider" />.
The default implementation calls the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A> method on the specified `provider`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A>方法对指定`provider`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that acts as a reference point for <c>upLevel</c>.
The number of ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> generations to fetch.
0 indicates no ancestor nodes are retrieved and -1 indicates that all ancestors might be retrieved and cached.

Provides a method that site map providers can override to perform an optimized retrieval of one or more levels of parent and ancestor nodes, relative to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object.
The default <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A> method only checks for an `upLevel` parameter that is less than -1 and a `node` parameter that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A>方法仅检查`upLevel`小于-1 的参数和一个`node`参数`null`。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> class caches site map information in memory, the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A> method is not used.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>类缓存在内存中，站点映射信息<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A>方法不适用。

trans-unit.source: Site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A> method to perform an optimized retrieval of parent and ancestor nodes of the specified <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintAncestorNodes%2A>方法来执行父节点和上级节点指定的优化的检索<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to traverse from the specified <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: `upLevel`参数用于指定的父节点和上级节点以从指定遍历多少个级别<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: If fewer levels exist than are requested, all available ancestor nodes are returned within the specified bound.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在较少的级别的少于请求，所有可用的祖先节点将返回指定范围内。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the parent node can be linked to the specified <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，可链接的父节点到指定<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upLevel" /> is less than -1.
<paramref name="node" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that acts as a reference point for <c>upLevel</c>.
The number of ancestor <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> generations to fetch.
0 indicates no ancestor nodes are retrieved and -1 indicates that all ancestors (and their descendant nodes to the level of <c>node</c>) might be retrieved and cached.
The number of descendant <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> generations to fetch.
0 indicates no descendant nodes are retrieved and -1 indicates that all descendant nodes might be retrieved and cached.
Provides a method that site map providers can override to perform an optimized retrieval of nodes found in the proximity of the specified node.
The default <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method only checks for an `upLevel` and `downLevel` parameters that are less than -1 and a `node` parameter that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法仅检查`upLevel`和`downLevel`小于-1 的参数和一个`node`参数`null`。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider> object caches site map information in memory, the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method is not used.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>对象缓存在内存中，站点映射信息<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法不适用。

trans-unit.source: Site map providers can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method to perform an optimized lookup of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects in the proximity of the specified <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: 站点地图提供程序可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法来执行经优化的查找<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>接近于指定的对象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to traverse from the specified <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: `upLevel`参数用于指定的父节点和上级节点以从指定遍历多少个级别<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of child nodes from the current node to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: `downLevel`参数用于指定从要检索的当前节点的子节点的多少个级别。

trans-unit.source: If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A> method, using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果首选，祖先和后代节点可以链接到<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>返回<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.HintNeighborhoodNodes%2A>方法，使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ParentNode%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="upLevel" /> or <paramref name="downLevel" /> is less than -1.
<paramref name="node" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase.Name" /> of the provider to initialize.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that can contain additional attributes to help initialize the provider.
These attributes are read from the site map provider configuration in the Web.config file.
Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> implementation, including any resources that are needed to load site map data from persistent storage.
The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> object to do so.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法不会实际生成站点图，它仅而准备的状态<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>对象，若要这样做。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation initializes the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SecurityTrimmingEnabled%2A> property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现初始化<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SecurityTrimmingEnabled%2A>从站点导航配置站点地图提供商提供的属性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法以初始化任何状态和从持久性存储区加载站点地图数据所需的资源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果派生的类使用文件来存储站点地图数据，任何文件初始化可以执行在<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类使用某些其他类型的数据存储，如关系数据库中，初始化数据库连接可能会执行。

trans-unit.source: Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method with its <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 其他属性，例如文件名或连接字符串，由 ASP.NET 配置系统读取，并将其传递给<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法替换其<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法准备 Microsoft Access 数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: The connection string for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection> object is passed in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>传入的对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>参数<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，由提供程序特定的部分中的 Web.config 文件中提供的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，`accessSiteMapConnectionString`包含承载站点地图数据的 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to first call the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method for the base class before performing your own initializations.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />方法在派生类中，请务必第一次调用<see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.Initialize(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />之前执行您自己的初始化基类的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> that contains user information.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> that is requested by the user.
Retrieves a Boolean value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object can be viewed by the user in the specified context.
<see langword="true" /> if security trimming is enabled and <paramref name="node" /> can be viewed by the user or security trimming is not enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default behavior when security trimming is enabled is as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 当启用了安全修整时的默认行为是下表中所述。

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 条件

trans-unit.source: Return Value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Roles%2A> exists on `node` and the current user is in at least one of the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Roles%2A>上是否存在`node`并且当前用户在至少一个指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: - or -
The current thread has an associated `WindowsIdentity` that has file access to the requested URL and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.
trans-unit.target: 当前线程都有一个相关`WindowsIdentity`具有文件访问权限所请求 URL 和 URL 位于应用程序的目录结构中。

trans-unit.source: - or -
The current user is authorized specifically for the requested URL in the `authorization` element for the current application and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.
trans-unit.target: 当前用户授权专门为所请求 URL 中`authorization`对于当前的应用程序和 URL 的元素是位于应用程序的目录结构。

trans-unit.source: None of the preceding conditions is met.
trans-unit.target: 满足上述条件组成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is <see langword="null" />.
\- or -
<paramref name="node" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> object of the current provider.
The parent provider of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前的父提供程序<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: All classes that implement the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 实现抽象的所有类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。

trans-unit.source: Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection> collection by the providers themselves.
trans-unit.target: 之外的作用域维护提供程序之间的任何层次结构关系<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection>由提供程序本身的集合。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 有关功能的提供程序层次结构的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ParentProvider%2A> property in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ParentProvider%2A>实现抽象类中的属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> to remove from the node collection maintained by the provider.
Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object from the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.

Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can override the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RemoveNode%2A> method and provide logic for removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects from the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RemoveNode%2A>方法，并提供用于删除逻辑<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>从站点地图提供商提供由维护的节点集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RemoveNode%2A> method throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RemoveNode%2A>方法抛出异常<xref:System.NotImplementedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> for which the site map currently exists.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve" /> event.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> provided by the event handler delegate that is registered to handle the event or, if more than one delegate is registered to handle the event, the return value of the last delegate in the delegate chain; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.

The `context` parameter and a reference to the provider that called the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A> method are passed to the constructor of any associated <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: `context`参数和调用提供程序的引用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResolveSiteMapNode%2A>方法传递给构造任何的函数关联<xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the resource key that is used for localizing <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> attributes.
A string containing the resource key name.
trans-unit.target: 包含资源密钥名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResourceKey%2A> property is used with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetImplicitResourceString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.ResourceKey%2A>属性用于<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetImplicitResourceString%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>类。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Description%2A> properties, as well as any additional attributes that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Attributes%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object, the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetImplicitResourceString%2A> method takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetExplicitResourceString%2A> when the localization is enabled with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.EnableLocalization%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Title%2A>和<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Description%2A>属性，以及在中定义任何其他属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.Attributes%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象，<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetImplicitResourceString%2A>方法将优先于<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetExplicitResourceString%2A>时使用启用本地化<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.EnableLocalization%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> object of the site map data that the current provider represents.
The root <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> of the current site map data provider.
trans-unit.target: 根<see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />当前站点地图数据提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation performs security trimming on the returned node.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回的节点上执行安全修整。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现调用抽象<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.GetRootNodeCore%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A> property in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode%2A>实现抽象类中的属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode" /> property in a derived class, be sure that the implementation does not navigate the provider hierarchy, if one exists, to find the absolute root node of the site.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootNode" />属性在派生类中，请确保实现不导航提供程序层次结构中，如果存在，若要查找站点的绝对根节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> object in the current provider hierarchy.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" /> that is the top-level site map provider in the provider hierarchy that the current provider belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapProvider" />当前提供程序所属的提供程序层次结构中的顶层站点站点地图提供。

trans-unit.source: All classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 实现的所有类<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类可以支持站点地图提供程序层次结构的概念。

trans-unit.source: Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection> collection by the providers themselves.
trans-unit.target: 之外的作用域维护提供程序之间的任何层次结构关系<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProviderCollection>由提供程序本身的集合。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see <xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 有关功能的提供程序层次结构的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.XmlSiteMapProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A> property in a class that implements the abstract <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A>实现抽象类中的属性<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用简单的逻辑来确定是否当前的提供程序为提供程序层次结构的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A> property for the parent provider as its own.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供程序是层次结构的一部分，它使用<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.RootProvider%2A>父提供程序为其自身的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供程序不是层次结构的一部分，提供程序是其自己的根提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider>类。

trans-unit.source: There is a circular reference to the current site map provider.
Gets a Boolean value indicating whether a site map provider filters site map nodes based on a user's role.
<see langword="true" /> if the provider is configured to filter nodes based on role; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果配置了提供程序来筛选基于角色的节点否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Security trimming cannot be set programmatically—it is set in the configuration for the provider.
trans-unit.target: 不能以编程方式设置安全修整-提供程序的配置中设置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode" /> property is called.

You can create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>的当前请求的页，而无需通过订阅到实现自定义网站地图提供商提供的表示形式<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.SiteMapResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: Subscribers attach a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventHandler> object to receive notification when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A> property is called and can return a custom <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object instead of the default one that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 订阅服务器附加<xref:System.Web.SiteMapResolveEventHandler>对象以便接收通知时<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A>属性称为，可返回自定义<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>对象而不是一个由默认<xref:System.Web.SiteMapProvider.CurrentNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
